actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to exempt the Columbia Dam and Reservoir in Tennessee from the provisions of the Endangered Species Act of 1973.

summary.text: Amends the Endangered Species Act of 1973 exempt the Columbia Dam and Reservoir in Tennessee from certain prohibitions against the harming or killing of endangered or threatened species attributable to the construction of such dam.

titles.title: A bill to exempt the Columbia Dam and Reservoir in Tennessee from the provisions of the Endangered Species Act of 1973.
